mapper.sql: id, parent, name, description, sortindex, mobileDeviceConfig, parentDeviceConfig, mobileCoverId
mapper.select: SELECT c.NAME AS TEXT, c.id AS id, c.parent AS parentId, "" AS url, c.sortindex AS sortindex, "" as parameters, ic.clsId AS iconCls, icm.updateUser AS updateUser, icm.updateTime AS updateTime, 0 as isView, 0 as type FROM fr_folderentry c LEFT JOIN iconCls_menu icm ON icm.entryid=c.`id` and icm.menuType=0 LEFT JOIN iconCls ic ON ic.id=icm.iconClsId WHERE c.mobileDeviceConfig IN (1, 3, 5, 7) UNION ALL SELECT b.NAME AS TEXT, b.id AS id, b.parent AS parentId, b.reportletPath AS url, b.sortindex AS sortindex, b.transmitParameters as parameters, ic.clsId AS iconCls, icm.updateUser AS updateUser, icm.updateTime AS updateTime, b.isView as isView, 2 as type FROM fr_reportletentry b LEFT JOIN iconCls_menu icm ON icm.entryid=b.`id`and icm.menuType=2 LEFT JOIN iconCls ic ON ic.id=icm.iconClsId WHERE b.mobileDeviceConfig IN (1, 3, 5, 7) UNION ALL SELECT f.NAME AS TEXT, f.id AS id, f.parent AS parentId, f.url AS url, f.sortindex AS sortindex, "" as parameters, ic.clsId AS iconCls, icm.updateUser AS updateUser, icm.updateTime AS updateTime, 0 as isView, 3 as type FROM fr_urlentry f LEFT JOIN iconCls_menu icm ON icm.entryid=f.`id` and icm.menuType=3 LEFT JOIN iconCls ic ON ic.id=icm.iconClsId WHERE f.mobileDeviceConfig IN (1, 3, 5, 7)
mapper.insert:
insert into fr_folderentry
id,
parent,
name,
description,
sortindex,
mobileDeviceConfig,
parentDeviceConfig,
mobileCoverId,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update fr_folderentry
parent = #{parent,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sortindex = #{sortindex,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mobileDeviceConfig = #{mobiledeviceconfig,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parentDeviceConfig = #{parentdeviceconfig,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mobileCoverId = #{mobilecoverid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update fr_folderentry set parent = #{parent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sortindex = #{sortindex,jdbcType=BIGINT}, mobileDeviceConfig = #{mobiledeviceconfig,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parentDeviceConfig = #{parentdeviceconfig,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mobileCoverId = #{mobilecoverid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
